name: Harris Newman
description:
'''Harris Newman''' is a mastering engineer working out of [[Grey Market Mastering]] in [[Montreal|Montreal, Quebec]], Canada. His studio shares a building with the [[Hotel2Tango]] recording studio, as well as [[Constellation Records (Canada)|Constellation Records]]. Newman has mastered hundreds of albums since 1998,{{citation needed|date=September 2020}} for artists including [[Wolf Parade]], [[Frog Eyes]],{{citation needed|date=September 2020}} [[A Silver Mt. Zion]],{{citation needed|date=September 2020}} [[Vic Chesnutt]],{{citation needed|date=September 2020}} [[Matthew Swann (musician)|Astral Swans]],{{citation needed|date=September 2020}} [[Carla Bozulich]],{{citation needed|date=September 2020}} [[BBQ]],{{citation needed|date=September 2020}} [[Les Sexareenos]],{{citation needed|date=September 2020}} [[Ravens & Chimes]],{{citation needed|date=September 2020}} Molasses,{{citation needed|date=September 2020}} [[Think About Life]],{{citation needed|date=September 2020}} [[We Are Wolves]],  [[aKido]],{{citation needed|date=September 2020}} and Oiseaux-TempÃªte.{{citation needed|date=September 2020}}

He is also a guitarist and bass player, and has recorded with Montreal groups [[Sackville (band)|Sackville]], [[Hrsta]], Triple Burner,{{citation needed|date=September 2020}} [[Esmerine]], [[Angela Desveaux]], as well as his own acoustic guitar project, which has seen multiple release on Strange Attractors Audio House. His acoustic guitar style has been compared to [[John Fahey (musician)|John Fahey]]'s output.
